question: Several kinds of birds live on a small island. A storm destroys most of the plants on which the birds feed and build their nests. Which kind of bird is most likely going to survive on the island?
candidate_answers: (A) the birds that have the greatest number (B) the birds that are most able to adapt (C) the birds that can fly the farthest (D) the birds with the strongest beaks
answer: the birds that can fly the farthest
label: C
